channel.title: (adding vote) help please!
channel.description: Hey moparscape please can someone help me add command ::vote so people can vote because i have added it but when me or others type ::vote it dont do anything, nothing pops up.. please can someone help as i would very much appriceate it and you can tv me! :)

item.title: (adding vote) help please!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I’m guessing your using Galkons Refactored…

Go into your client files, go into client.java and find:

When you find that, add this:

if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE")) launchURL("YOUR_URL_HERE");

Under this:

if(inputString.equals("region")) { System.out.println("Current region: " + anInt1069 + ", " + anInt1070); }

Hope this helps!

Read full topic
